recommended_movies: When a Man Loves a Woman (1994)

simulated_ratings.title: Mirror Has Two Faces, The (1996)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Smart, grown-up romance about companionship versus passion hits my sweet spot for character-driven love stories.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Powerful and artful, but the circular war violence feels heavy and distant from my usual comfort dramas.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Intimate, heartfelt documentary confessions align with my love for human stories.
